## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and user-specific files

# Visual Studio workspace
.vs/
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
bin/
obj/
Debug/
Release/

# Rider/JetBrains IDE files
.idea/

# Resharper
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper

# NuGet Packages
*.nupkg
packages/
*.snupkg
*.nuspec

# DotCover
*.dotCover

# Others
*.log
*.vsix
*.cache
*.dbmdl
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.class

# Node or other package managers if used
node_modules/
npm-debug.log
yarn-error.log

# Files generated by Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# Ignore JSON files only if you want to keep secrets out (optional)
# *.json
